snippet: India failed to reach the cricket World Twenty20 semifinals despite beating South Africa by one run in a gripping final Super Eight Group Two match on Tuesday.
abstract: India fails to reach the cricket World Twenty20 semifinals despite beating South Africa by one run in a gripping final Super Eight Group Two match.
lead_paragraph: India failed to reach the cricket World Twenty20 semifinals despite beating South Africa by one run in a gripping final Super Eight Group Two match on Tuesday.

headline.seo: India Exits World Twenty20 Tournament Despite Win
headline.main: India Exits World Twenty20 Tournament Despite Win
